summary:
Ragnarok Odyssey Ace is an updated version of Ragnarok Odyssey and will be developed for PlayStation Vita and PlayStation 3. This new version of the game will contain: all the DLC from the original game, new enemies, new skills, new dungeons like the Yggdrasil Tower with single and multiplayer modes, new HUD, new gameplay balance adjustment and an extra episode after the ending. the first print copies of the game will include various in-game bonus. It's also possible to import save data from the original game to use them in Ragnarok Odyssey Ace.
The release date for the PlayStation Vita version is August 29, 2013 in Japan.
Nobuo Uematsu helped create new OST for Ragnarok Odyssey Ace.
name: ラグナロク オデッセイ エース
name_cn: 仙境传说 奥德赛 加强版
